001package com.telos.loops.properties;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
004import com.telos.loops.internal.CoreSender;
005import com.telos.loops.internal.mappers.ContactPropertiesMapper;
006import com.telos.loops.model.RequestOptions;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013
014/**
015 * Client for managing custom contact properties in Loops.
016 *
017 * <p>This client allows you to create and list custom properties that can be attached to contacts.
018 * Custom properties enable you to store additional data fields beyond the standard contact fields.
019 *
020 * <h2>Example Usage</h2>
021 *
022 * <pre>{@code
023 * LoopsClient client = LoopsClient.builder()
024 *         .apiKey("your-api-key")
025 *         .build();
026 *
027 * // Create a custom property
028 * ContactPropertyCreateRequest request = new ContactPropertyCreateRequest(
029 *     "accountTier",  // property name
030 *     "string"  // data type (string, number, boolean, date)
031 * );
032 * ContactPropertyResponse response = client.contactProperties().create(request);
033 *
034 * // List all custom properties
035 * List<ContactProperty> properties = client.contactProperties().list();
036 *
037 * // List properties filtered by type
038 * List<ContactProperty> stringProps = client.contactProperties().list("string");
039 *
040 * // Display properties
041 * for (ContactProperty prop : properties) {
042 *     System.out.println("Property: " + prop.key() + " (" + prop.type() + ")");
043 * }
044 *
045 * // Async example
046 * CompletableFuture<ContactPropertyResponse> future =
047 *     client.contactProperties().createAsync(request);
048 * }</pre>
049 *
050 * <p>All methods are available in both synchronous and asynchronous (CompletableFuture) variants.
051 *
052 * @see com.telos.loops.LoopsClient
053 */
054public class ContactPropertiesClient {
055  private static final String PROPERTIES_PATH = "/contacts/properties";
056
057  private final CoreSender sender;
058
059  public ContactPropertiesClient(CoreSender sender) {
060    this.sender = Objects.requireNonNull(sender);
061  }
062
063  // ============================================================
064  // Create Operations
065  // ============================================================
066
067  /**
068   * Creates a new custom contact property.
069   *
070   * <p>This method uses default request options.
071   *
072   * @param request the request object containing property name and data type
073   * @return the response containing the created property details
074   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsApiException if the API returns an error
075   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsValidationException if the request fails validation
076   * @see #createAsync(ContactPropertyCreateRequest) for the asynchronous variant
077   */
078  public ContactPropertyResponse create(ContactPropertyCreateRequest request) {
079    return create(request, RequestOptions.none());
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Creates a new custom contact property with custom request options.
084   *
085   * @param request the request object containing property name and data type
086   * @param options additional request options such as custom headers
087   * @return the response containing the created property details
088   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsApiException if the API returns an error
089   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsValidationException if the request fails validation
090   * @see #createAsync(ContactPropertyCreateRequest, RequestOptions) for the asynchronous variant
091   */
092  public ContactPropertyResponse create(
093      ContactPropertyCreateRequest request, RequestOptions options) {
094    var generatedRequest = ContactPropertiesMapper.toGenerated(request);
095    var generatedResponse =
096        sender.postJson(
097            PROPERTIES_PATH,
098            generatedRequest,
099            com.telos.loops.internal.openapi.model.ContactPropertySuccessResponse.class,
100            options);
101    return ContactPropertiesMapper.fromGenerated(generatedResponse);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Asynchronously creates a new custom contact property.
106   *
107   * <p>This method uses default request options.
108   *
109   * @param request the request object containing property name and data type
110   * @return a CompletableFuture containing the created property details
111   * @see #create(ContactPropertyCreateRequest) for the synchronous variant
112   */
113  public CompletableFuture<ContactPropertyResponse> createAsync(
114      ContactPropertyCreateRequest request) {
115    return createAsync(request, RequestOptions.none());
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Asynchronously creates a new custom contact property with custom request options.
120   *
121   * @param request the request object containing property name and data type
122   * @param options additional request options such as custom headers
123   * @return a CompletableFuture containing the created property details
124   * @see #create(ContactPropertyCreateRequest, RequestOptions) for the synchronous variant
125   */
126  public CompletableFuture<ContactPropertyResponse> createAsync(
127      ContactPropertyCreateRequest request, RequestOptions options) {
128    var generatedRequest = ContactPropertiesMapper.toGenerated(request);
129    return sender
130        .postJsonAsync(
131            PROPERTIES_PATH,
132            generatedRequest,
133            com.telos.loops.internal.openapi.model.ContactPropertySuccessResponse.class,
134            options)
135        .thenApply(ContactPropertiesMapper::fromGenerated);
136  }
137
138  // ============================================================
139  // List Operations
140  // ============================================================
141
142  /**
143   * Lists all custom contact properties.
144   *
145   * <p>This method uses default request options and returns all properties regardless of type.
146   *
147   * @return a list of all custom contact properties
148   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsApiException if the API returns an error
149   * @see #listAsync() for the asynchronous variant
150   */
151  public List<ContactProperty> list() {
152    return list(null, RequestOptions.none());
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Lists custom contact properties filtered by type.
157   *
158   * @param listType optional filter for property type (e.g., "string", "number", "boolean",
159   *     "date")
160   * @return a list of custom contact properties matching the filter
161   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsApiException if the API returns an error
162   * @see #listAsync(String) for the asynchronous variant
163   */
164  public List<ContactProperty> list(String listType) {
165    return list(listType, RequestOptions.none());
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Lists custom contact properties filtered by type with custom request options.
170   *
171   * @param listType optional filter for property type (e.g., "string", "number", "boolean",
172   *     "date")
173   * @param options additional request options such as custom headers
174   * @return a list of custom contact properties matching the filter
175   * @throws com.telos.loops.error.LoopsApiException if the API returns an error
176   * @see #listAsync(String, RequestOptions) for the asynchronous variant
177   */
178  public List<ContactProperty> list(String listType, RequestOptions options) {
179    Map<String, String> queryParams = new HashMap<>();
180    if (listType != null) {
181      queryParams.put("list", listType);
182    }
183
184    var generatedProperties =
185        sender.getList(
186            PROPERTIES_PATH,
187            queryParams,
188            new TypeReference<List<com.telos.loops.internal.openapi.model.ContactProperty>>() {},
189            options);
190    return generatedProperties.stream()
191        .map(ContactPropertiesMapper::fromGenerated)
192        .collect(Collectors.toList());
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Asynchronously lists all custom contact properties.
197   *
198   * <p>This method uses default request options and returns all properties regardless of type.
199   *
200   * @return a CompletableFuture containing a list of all custom contact properties
201   * @see #list() for the synchronous variant
202   */
203  public CompletableFuture<List<ContactProperty>> listAsync() {
204    return listAsync(null, RequestOptions.none());
205  }
206
207  /**
208   * Asynchronously lists custom contact properties filtered by type.
209   *
210   * @param listType optional filter for property type (e.g., "string", "number", "boolean",
211   *     "date")
212   * @return a CompletableFuture containing a list of custom contact properties matching the filter
213   * @see #list(String) for the synchronous variant
214   */
215  public CompletableFuture<List<ContactProperty>> listAsync(String listType) {
216    return listAsync(listType, RequestOptions.none());
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Asynchronously lists custom contact properties filtered by type with custom request options.
221   *
222   * @param listType optional filter for property type (e.g., "string", "number", "boolean",
223   *     "date")
224   * @param options additional request options such as custom headers
225   * @return a CompletableFuture containing a list of custom contact properties matching the filter
226   * @see #list(String, RequestOptions) for the synchronous variant
227   */
228  public CompletableFuture<List<ContactProperty>> listAsync(
229      String listType, RequestOptions options) {
230    Map<String, String> queryParams = new HashMap<>();
231    if (listType != null) {
232      queryParams.put("list", listType);
233    }
234
235    return sender
236        .getListAsync(
237            PROPERTIES_PATH,
238            queryParams,
239            new TypeReference<List<com.telos.loops.internal.openapi.model.ContactProperty>>() {},
240            options)
241        .thenApply(
242            generatedProperties ->
243                generatedProperties.stream()
244                    .map(ContactPropertiesMapper::fromGenerated)
245                    .collect(Collectors.toList()));
246  }
247}
